Germany XEN VPS
==========================================================
Our Cheap and reliable Germany Xen Windows VPS Hosting is unbeatable in quality, performance and price. We use Solusvm Powered Xen-HVM platform to provide Windows VPS Hosting, which means you will have dedicated resources of the node to utilize 100%. You will have full administrator access to install any kind of application on it without any restrictions.

- Xen-HVM Platform - Flexibility, Secured and Low overhead.
- Full Control - Administrator and Remote Access.
- High Volume Network - 100Mbps Unmetered Burstable Network.
- 99.9% Uptime Guarantee - Maximum Available SLA
- Supports - ASP.net and JScript.net Applications, Forex Trading, Access Databases, Remote Access to MSSQL DBs and more.

==========================================================
